frames.caption: A baby and a puppy, both dressed in matching lion costumes, sit on a soft carpet. The baby is smiling joyfully while the puppy looks curiously at a colorful ball between them. Warm, soft lighting creates a cozy and playful atmosphere.
frames.description: The scene captures a playful and heartwarming moment between a baby and a puppy indoors. Both are dressed in lion costumes, adding a whimsical touch to the setting.

frames.caption: A baby dressed in a lion costume plays on a soft carpet with a puppy also wearing a lion mane. They are both focused on a colorful ball, creating a playful and heartwarming scene.
frames.description: The scene captures a cozy indoor setting with warm lighting, where a baby and a puppy are interacting playfully. Both are dressed in lion-themed outfits, adding a whimsical touch to the moment.

summary: People: baby. Animals: puppy. Objects: ball, carpet, costumes. Actions: smiling, sitting, playing. Emotions: joyful, curious, joy, curiosity. Scenes: indoor, playful, playtime. Concepts: costume, friendship, cuteness, companionship
